translation: Therefore, without attachment, always perform the actions that should be done; for by performing actions without attachment, one reaches the Supreme.
commentary: 3.19 Therefore therefore? unattached without attachment? Constantly always? The work which should be done? Karma action? News perform? unattached without attachment? Hi because? conducting performing? Karma action? But the Supreme? Apnoti attains? The man is man.Commentary If you perform actions without attachment? for the sake of the Lord? you will attain to Selfrealization through purity of heart. (Cf.II.64IV.19?23XVIII.49).
